overview: Funnyman Red Skelton hams it up as Deadeye, Freddie the Freeloader, Cauliflower McPugg and a host of other beloved characters in this 15-episode collection of the comedian's long-running variety show. Guest stars include Ed Wynn, Don Knotts, Rhonda Fleming, Juliet Prowse and more. Skelton's popular Emmy-winning show premiered in 1951 and ran for a whopping 20 seasons.
title: Red Skelton: America's Clown Prince
